companyInfo.Competitors: Paragon Properties, Broder & Sachse Real Estate, Brookdale Senior Living

jobDescription: Manage the Human Resources services, policies and programs to provide a high performance culture that exemplifies our culture of excellence, effective and ethical. Provide recommendations to management on strategic staff planning, compensation, benefits, recruiting, training and employee relations. Provide leadership in the department to facilitate our culture and enhance our new HR technologies.  1 - PHR preferred  2 Expert in payroll, benefits, compensation, training, recruiting and technologies  3 Ensure compliance with federal, state and local requirements  4 Deep understanding of ACA reporting and requirements  5 Communicate with Management with enhancements and changes to policies, procedures and etc.Experience
